attributes.action: Make space on your land to park your car off the road
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you have a front garden or drive that can take a car ,then it should be made over into a car park to keep them off the public road. In Japan you have to pay a parking permit once a year if you dont have space to park off the road on your land. To many people have too many cars parked on estate roads now ,get them off and onto the drive or front garden space, or pay a year parking space to park on the road outside your house.
